jobDescription: Led development of React applications, mentored junior developers, and collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality software solutions.
Developed and maintained large-scale web applications using React and Node.js. Improved application performance by 40% through optimization techniques.
Lead data science initiatives, develop machine learning models for Azure AI services, and mentor a team of 8 data scientists.
Built recommendation systems and personalization algorithms that increased user engagement by 25%. Worked with big data technologies including Spark and Kafka.
Manage product roadmap for AWS services, coordinate with engineering teams, and drive strategic initiatives that resulted in 30% revenue growth.
Led product development for iOS applications, conducted market research, and collaborated with design and engineering teams to launch 5 successful products.
